TopicTitle: [Request] Could I have the cupola texture in a .png format?

Articles.Content:
I need the stock cupolas texture in a .png format, as I do not possess the tools to edit .mbm files.

Mods feel free to move this thread if it's in the wrong place.

The best image I could find is a .jpg papercraft layout for the Cupola.

http://www./convkey/9575/1ucxqu9jua2z7auzg.jpg?size_id=d

I got it from Arc5555's glorious, magnificent, wonderful, papercraft layout page.
I think the modding section is the best place to seek an answer to this. And so, moved.
Look in the Tools and Applications subforum of Addon Releases and you should find the mbm to png converter.

Look in the Tools and Applications subforum of Addon Releases and you should find the mbm to png converter.

Thanks! That was exactly what I needed.
